claim_card.claim: A conservation law is asserted: ∇μ Φμν = 0, interpreted as conservation of alignment work rather than energy–momentum.
claim_card.test_hook: Given Φ from S(x), evaluate ∇μ Φμν numerically; treat deviation as model error and test whether corrected λ(r) reduces divergence.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: ∇μ Φμν = 0 ... conservation of alignment work rather than just energy-momentum
